summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3402 for the improvement of Murray Avenue from Beach Drive to West Holly Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of a trunk sewer and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 42221, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
